product_description: wooden folding table of size 100cm x 200cm with long black iron legs

copy_data.primary_copy: Transform any space into an elegant dining or workspace with our sleek wooden folding table. Style meets function.
copy_data.headline: Modern Living, Made Simple
copy_data.description: Crafted from premium wood with striking black iron legs, this versatile folding table brings sophisticated style and practical storage to any room.

claude_optimized_prompt: A modern minimalist dining room with a wooden folding table, black iron legs, natural sunlight streaming through large windows, soft shadows, neutral tones, houseplants in background, empty space on left third, photorealistic 8K, professional product photography, cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A modern minimalist dining room designed with a wooden folding table featuring black iron legs. The room is bathed in natural sunlight streaming through large windows, creating soft shadows on the walls and floor. Neutral tones dominate the decor, including subtle grays and whites. Houseplants in the background add a touch of greenery, while clean, empty space occupies the left third of the image. The scene is captured with photorealistic 8K quality, professional product photography style, cinematic lighting, and a shallow depth of field to emphasize the table and atmosphere.
